# SHOOTING SETTING (Still Photography) ## AE BKT SETTING Adjust exposure bracketing settings. | Option | Description | |----------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **FRAMES/STEP SETTING** | Choose the number of shots in the bracketing sequence and the amount exposure is varied with each shot.
â€¢ **FRAMES**: Choose the number of shots in the bracketing sequence.
â€¢ **STEP**: Choose the amount exposure is varied with each shot. | | **1 FRAME/CONTINUOUS** | â€¢ **1 FRAME**: The shots in the bracketing sequence are taken one at a time.
â€¢ **CONTINUOUS**: The shots in the bracketing sequence are taken in a single burst. | | **SEQUENCE SETTING** | Choose the order in which the shots are taken. | ## FILM SIMULATION BKT Choose the three film simulation types used for film simulation bracketing (ðŸ“– 130). ## FOCUS BKT SETTING Choose from **AUTO** and **MANUAL** focus bracketing modes (ðŸ“– 115). ## PHOTOMETRY Choose how the camera meters exposure (ðŸ“– 108).
